pkgmetadata.longdescription: Variable Length Markov Chains with Covariates // Estimates Variable Length Markov Chains (VLMC) models and VLMC with covariates models from discrete sequences. Supports model selection via information criteria and simulation of new sequences from an estimated model. See Bhlmann, P. and Wyner, A. J. (1999) doi:10.1214/aos/1018031204 for VLMC and Zanin Zambom, A., Kim, S. and Lopes Garcia, N. (2022) doi:10.1111/jtsa.12615 for VLMC with covariates.
